title: Unranked mid/support main looking for Team or Duo ranked.
body:
I never really got around to "climbing the ladder".
Until recently when new changes have been made
to the ranked system and I've decided to give it a go.
I've been playing league of legends since 2013 but I've recently
**Switch to the OCE server** and lost my champion mastery.
And having no rank I have nothing to show for it.

I'm Looking for some chill people to play a few ranked games with.
I mostly play assertive supports{{champion:25}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:53}}{{champion:26}} 
And Mage Mid laners{{champion:115}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:1}} 

I am open to **trying new champions and roles to work with you**.
My Profile looks like a total beginners since I switched to OCE and lost stats like
honor points, match history, champion mastery points Etc.

Leave a **comment** with your** role and champion pool** or add me in game
if you are interested. ~Bespooks.

replies.body: I see you readin this Y u no add? help a guy out.
